name: Federation of Small Businesses
membership: EMOTA - the European eCommerce and Omni-Channel Trade Association
goal: The FSB represents the interests of 200,000 small businesses in all sectors in the whole of the UK. It is the largest business organisation in the UK.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
SME policies.
Single Market legislation.
Better Regulation agenda.
Digital Single Market.
Environmental issues.
Employment legislation.
